EmailTemplate.name: Customer Experience (CX).Airbus Go To Green Reminder.Airbus GTG Reminder Message
EmailTemplate.subject: Have you checked your Customers Feedback? I am watching!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
I can tell you haven’t read my last email and that you haven’t gone into SFDC to read your customers Airbus survey results. Why not?! Don’t wait – login today and see what your customer had to say. I’m watching you!
In the event you do not still have the link to the SFDC report it is below along with a quick video session with instructions for reviewing the results.
Finding the feedback:
- Watch the 2-minute instructional video <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/Y0G0u0LZ00000002qIQ0xX8]]> - Log into Salesforce <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/x0Q0000u2y80qZI0MG000X0]]> and review your airline participants' feedback record. (Link to the Feedback Report)
Michelle Dawn Customer Experience (CX) Honeywell | Aerospace d: 480.592.4120 m: 480.540.5558 Michelle.Dawn@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Michelle.Dawn@Honeywell.com"><span style=]]>
